user_query: I'm planning a trip to New York City next month and I need some information to make my visit memorable. Can you provide me with the historical stock data for Microsoft (symbol: MSFT) and Salesforce (symbol: CRM)? Additionally, I'd like to know the effective spread, eligible volume, and price improvement of Microsoft (symbol: MSFT). Furthermore, I'm interested in reading news articles related to the tech industry, especially those mentioning Taylor Swift. Please fetch the latest news articles about Taylor Swift and provide me with the top 10 results.

TaskList.description: Fetch historical stock data for Microsoft (MSFT) and Salesforce (CRM).
Retrieve the effective spread, eligible volume, and price improvement for Microsoft (MSFT).
Search for the latest news articles related to the tech industry mentioning Taylor Swift.
Compile the top 10 results of news articles regarding Taylor Swift.
